languages.text: "Итак, теперь ты знаешь, куда направились твои братья. Как ты поступишь?"
"So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"
languages.original_text: "Итак, теперь ты знаешь, куда направились твои братья. Как ты поступишь?"

traits.locale_text: "So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"
"So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"
"So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"
"So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"

languages.text: «Bueno, ahora sabe adónde se dirigían sus hermanos. ¿Qué hará a continuación?».
languages.original_text: "So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, ahora sabe adónde se dirigían sus hermanos. ¿Qué hará a continuación?».

languages.text: “既然你已经知道你的兄弟们去了什么地方，你打算怎么办？”
languages.original_text: "So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"

traits.locale_text: “既然你已经知道你的兄弟们去了什么地方，你打算怎么办？”

languages.text: 「それで兄弟たちがどこへ向かったのか分かったのか？どうするつもりだ？」
languages.original_text: "So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"

traits.locale_text: 「それで兄弟たちがどこへ向かったのか分かったのか？どうするつもりだ？」

languages.text: « Maintenant que vous savez où se rendent vos frères, que comptez-vous faire ? »
languages.original_text: "So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que vous savez où se rendent vos frères, que comptez-vous faire ? »

languages.text: "Nun wisst Ihr also, wohin Eure Brüder unterwegs waren. Was werdet Ihr nun tun?"
languages.original_text: "So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"

traits.locale_text: "Nun wisst Ihr also, wohin Eure Brüder unterwegs waren. Was werdet Ihr nun tun?"

languages.text: "Kardeşlerinin nereye gittiğini biliyorsun. Şimdi ne yapacaksın?"
languages.original_text: "So, now you know where your brothers were heading. What will you do?"

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşlerinin nereye gittiğini biliyorsun. Şimdi ne yapacaksın?"
